wikipedia_page.main: Andrew Henderson (23 January 1922 – 18 August 2020) was a Scottish cricketer. He played in one first-class match for the Scotland cricket team, against Ireland, in 1953.

* Andrew Henderson (English cricketer) (born 1941), former English cricketer
* Andrew Henderson (diplomat) (1952–2017), British ambassador to Algeria
* Andrew Henderson (rugby league) (born 1979), English rugby league footballer
* Andrew Henderson (rugby union) (born 1980), Scottish rugby union footballer
